CustomField.description: -Ability to coordinate and execute services according to quotation/costing -Ability to work with overseas partners to manage import/export activities -Ability to convey clearly and accurately for shipment instructions, to other relevant departments (especially Operations, Warehouse, Customer Service, Accounts, and Registrar) for timely follow-up and delivery/receipt of shipment -Ability to monitor, track shipments enroute to destination. Ensure that shipment is delivered in a timely and correct manner -Ability to monitor and update relevant parties on shipment scheduling -Ability to monitor, track and update documentation in a timely manner -Ability to manage all discrepancies to avoid any delays or incurring any additional costs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Able to coordinate & execute services according to quotation/costing -Able to work with overseas partners to manage import/export activities -Able to convey clearly shipment instructions to other relevant departments timely -Able to monitor & track shipments enroute to destination in a timely & correct manner -Able to monitor & update relevant parties on shipment scheduling -Able to update documentation timely -Able to manage all discrepancies to avoid any delays or incurring any additional costs
CustomField.label: Project Management [Shipping]
